value.title: Team Uses AI and Robotics to Treat Spinal Cord Injuries
value.excerpt: A team of researchers at Rutgers University has employed artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics to formulate therapeutic proteins. The team was able to successfully stabilize an enzyme that can degrade scar tissues resulting from spinal cord injuries.

value.title: AI chatbot provides emotional bond for mental health app users

value.title: Artificial intelligence facilitates better control of global development aid
value.excerpt: A team of AI experts led by Stefan Feuerriegel, Head of LMU's Institute of Artificial Intelligence in Management, is injecting transparency into global development aid. The researchers have developed an artificial intelligence system that categorizes aid projects more comprehensively than it was possible up to now and facilitates better monitoring of these projects.
